FuncDef: This command displays information about hosts that are not yet linked to an in-band control plane protocol, such as DHCP or DHCPv6. Examples include hosts installed by data-triggers and hosts installed by RADIUS.
CLIs: managed-hosts type { aaa | data-triggered } [ ip <ip-address> ] [ mac <ieee-address> ]

ParaDef.Info: Displays information about managed hosts installed and removed only by RADIUS.
Displays information about managed hosts installed by data-triggers.
Displays information about a managed host with the specified IPv4 or IPv6 address.
Displays information about a managed host with the specified MAC address.
